channel.title: Some questions
channel.description:
i need help with these things 1.i cant make myslef admin/owner 2.xp rate i dont know how to change 3.make npcs say wat i want
if u can help with any tell me please :D pvpscape

item.title: Some questions
item.dc:creator: @Noobskape.no-ip.biz Noobskape.no-ip.biz
item.description:
@Noobskape.no-ip.biz wrote:

  1. how to make yourself, and other people, mod, admin, owner, co-owner,
    okay you open up your source file, and click on characters, it should be at the top, if not then its weird lol, but doesnt matter,
    then when it opens up with a bunch of names, with .txt files, click your name,
    E.G - Zezima…

it should come up with name, pass, ip, and aload of stuff…

like so -

[ACCOUNT]
character-username = skilz4life
character-password = 904425

[CHARACTER]
character-height = 0
character-posx = 2744
character-posy = 3468
character-rights = 0
character-ismember = 0
character-messages = 0
character-lastconnection = *******************
character-lastlogin = 20090416
character-energy = 100
character-gametime = 0
character-gamecount = 1681

Okay, where it says character rights, you need to change that to number …

1 for mod
2 for admin
3 for owner
3 for co-owner
4 for hidden admin
5 for hidden mod

character-posx = 2744
character-posy = 3468
character-rights = 1 <-- Mod

not sure bout ur 2nd question…

but number 3…
open up client.java

search for - “welcome to”
by holding down alt and pressing f
and it should say something like “welcome to allstarscape” or whatever,
change that to your server name

E.G

“welcome to noobskape! NOOBS”

then save it, and compile, and then rune your server, and your NPC should be saying “welcome to”…or … whatever you chose them to say…

  - noobskape

Read full topic
